basics.name: Jashawna Lewis
basics.label: Cybersecurity Analyst
basics.summary: Hello, I'm Jashawna Lewis, a Cybersecurity Analyst specializing in blueteam defense.

work.name: Enerflo
work.summary: Developing new APIs with NestJS, Typescript, GraphQL, and PostgreSQL.
highlights: Build APIs with NestJS, Typescript, GraphQL, and PostgreSQL.
Maintain web apps with Laravel & Javascript.

volunteer.position: UBports App Dev Steering Committee Head
volunteer.summary: Lead the UBports App Development committee and championed developer experience for the Ubuntu Touch operating system.
highlights: Support and develop the open-source Ubuntu Touch operating system.

projects.name: OpenStore
projects.description: The official app store for Ubuntu Touch
highlights: Built an API first web service built using TypeScript, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Created custom web client for searching and managing apps using JavaScript and Vue.js
Continued to maintain Qt/QML Ubuntu Touch app for installing applications.
